title: Future Leaders Scholarship
description: Supporting students who demonstrate leadership potential and academic excellence. Open to high school seniors and current college students pursuing any field of study.

essayPrompts.prompt: Describe a time when you demonstrated leadership in your community or school. What impact did your actions have?

title: STEM Excellence Award
description: Recognizing outstanding students pursuing degrees in Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics. Preference given to underrepresented minorities in STEM fields.

essayPrompts.prompt: How do you plan to use your STEM education to make a positive impact on society?

title: Community Service Champion
description: Awarded to students who have made significant contributions to their communities through volunteer work and service projects.

essayPrompts.prompt: Describe your most meaningful volunteer experience and what you learned from it.

title: First Generation Scholars Program
description: Supporting first-generation college students in achieving their educational goals. Must be the first in your immediate family to attend college.

essayPrompts.prompt: As a first-generation college student, what challenges have you faced and how have you overcome them?

title: Business Leaders of Tomorrow
description: For students pursuing business, entrepreneurship, or economics degrees who demonstrate innovative thinking and business acumen.

essayPrompts.prompt: Describe a business idea or innovation you've developed. How would you bring it to market?

title: Arts & Creativity Scholarship
description: Supporting students pursuing degrees in visual arts, performing arts, music, theater, or creative writing.

essayPrompts.prompt: How has art or creative expression shaped your identity and worldview?

title: Healthcare Heroes Scholarship
description: For students pursuing careers in healthcare, including nursing, medicine, pharmacy, public health, and allied health professions.

essayPrompts.prompt: Why do you want to pursue a career in healthcare, and what unique perspective will you bring to the field?

title: Environmental Sustainability Award
description: Recognizing students committed to environmental conservation, sustainability, and climate action.

essayPrompts.prompt: Describe an environmental challenge in your community and propose a solution.

title: Women in Tech Scholarship
description: Supporting women pursuing technology careers and addressing the gender gap in the tech industry.

essayPrompts.prompt: What challenges have you faced as a woman in technology, and how have you overcome them?

title: Military Family Scholarship
description: For children and spouses of active duty military members, veterans, or fallen service members.

essayPrompts.prompt: How has your military family experience shaped your values and educational goals?

title: Journalism & Media Excellence
description: For aspiring journalists, media professionals, and communications students committed to truth and ethical reporting.

essayPrompts.prompt: In an era of misinformation, what role do you believe journalists should play in society?

title: Education Innovators Award
description: Supporting future teachers and education professionals who are passionate about transforming education.

essayPrompts.prompt: Describe an innovative teaching method or educational approach you would like to implement in your future classroom.
